product_overview: LearnHub Plus is a comprehensive learning management system designed to facilitate online education through course management, user roles, assignments, forums, and integrated calendar and grade tracking functionalities.
core_goals: Provide a secure and robust authentication system with multiple user roles.
Enable efficient course creation, management, and enrollment.
Support assignment creation, submission, and grading workflows.
Facilitate communication among users via a discussion forum system.
Offer tailored dashboards for students, teachers, and administrators to enhance user experience.
Integrate calendar and scheduling to keep users informed of course events and deadlines.
Ensure scalability and maintainability through a modern tech stack including React, ASP.NET Core, and Supabase.
Deliver a consistent and accessible user interface with a reusable UI component library.
key_features: Authentication system with login, registration, and logout using Supabase Auth.
Role-based access control supporting student, teacher, and admin profiles.
Comprehensive course management - creation, viewing, updating, and organization.
Assignment management including creation, assessment, and submission handling.
Discussion forums for each course to facilitate peer and instructor communication.
Personalized dashboards for different user types covering relevant data and controls.
Calendar system displaying course schedules and key events.
Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS for consistency.
Backend ASP.NET Core API integrated with Supabase for data operations.
PostgreSQL database schema designed for LMS operations.
Utility functions and hooks that promote code reuse and responsiveness.
user_flow_summary: User registers an account and selects a role (student, teacher, admin).
User logs in and is directed to a role-specific dashboard.
Teachers create and manage courses and assignments via course and assignment pages.
Students view courses, enroll, submit assignments, and participate in forums.
Users engage in course-related discussions using the forum system.
Administrators manage users and oversee platform activities from the admin dashboard.
Users access calendar views to track schedules and deadlines.
Grades are tracked and displayed within the user's dashboard and dedicated grade pages.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication covering registration, login, logout.
Role-based access control enforced across all sections.
Accurate creation, editing, and deletion of courses and assignments.
Reliable submission and grading process for assignments.
Forum posts created, edited, and displayed correctly within courses.
Calendar events reflect actual course schedules and updates.
Grades are calculated and displayed accurately.
Dashboards update dynamically based on user interactions and roles.
UI components are consistent across the platform and responsive on multiple devices.
API endpoints correctly interact with the Supabase backend and database.
